meanings.definition: A person who is new to a particular activity or field.
meanings.sent1: The young kubie was eager to learn from the experienced players.
meanings.sent2: The kubie asked many questions to understand the game better.
meanings.sent3: The kubie's enthusiasm was infectious among the team.
meanings.sent4: In the world of coding, she was a kubie navigating through lines of unfamiliar code.
meanings.sent5: The kubie's fresh perspective brought new ideas to the project.

meanings.definition: To act in a hesitant or timid manner.
meanings.sent1: She tends to kubie before making important decisions.
meanings.sent2: He kubied at the edge of the diving board, unsure of jumping.
meanings.sent3: The cat kubied around the unfamiliar object in the room.
meanings.sent4: The student kubied before raising their hand to ask a question.
meanings.sent5: The puppy kubied towards the loud noise, unsure of what it was.

meanings.definition: A small, enclosed space or compartment.
meanings.sent1: The tiny kubie in the wall was perfect for storing keys.
meanings.sent2: She found a cozy kubie under the stairs to read her book.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel stored its nuts in a hidden kubie in the tree.
meanings.sent4: The treasure was hidden in a secret kubie in the old house.
meanings.sent5: The bird built its nest in a safe kubie high up in the tree.
